<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader3"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><B><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt" lang=EN-US
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. &#8211; 
Petrobras</FONT></B></FONT></P></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" lang=EN-US 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Report of Independent Registered Public Accounting 
Firm</FONT></P>
<DIV style="BORDER-BOTTOM: windowtext 1pt solid; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; 
PADDING-BOTTOM: 1pt; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in; BORDER-TOP: medium 
none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; PADDING-TOP: 0in">
<P style="BORDER-BOTTOM: medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-BOTTOM: 
0in; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in; BORDER-TOP: 
medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; PADDING-TOP: 0in"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 5pt" lang=EN-US face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" lang=EN-US face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE:
11pt" lang=EN-US face=Calibri,sans-serif>To the Board of Directors and 
Shareholders</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" lang=EN-US face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. - 
Petrobras</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" lang=EN-US face=Calibri,sans-serif>We have reviewed the accompanying 
condensed consolidated statement of financial position of Petr&#243;leo 
Brasileiro S.A. - Petrobras and its subsidiaries as of June 30, 2016, and the 
related condensed consolidated statements of income and comprehensive income for
the three-month and six-month periods ended June 30, 2016 and June 30, 2015 and 
the condensed consolidated statements of cash flows and changes in 
shareholders&#8217; equity for the six-month periods ended June 30, 2016 and 
June 30, 2015. This interimfinancial information is the responsibility of the 
Company's management.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" lang=EN-US face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" lang=EN-US face=Calibri,sans-serif>We conducted our review in accordance 
with the standards of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (United 
States). A review of interim financial information consists principally of 
applying analytical procedures and making inquiries of persons responsible for 
financial and accounting matters. It is substantially less in scope than an 
audit conducted in accordance with the standards of the Public Company 
Accounting Oversight Board (United States), the objective of which is the 
expression of an opinion regarding the financial statements taken as a whole. 
Accordingly, we do not express such an opinion.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" lang=EN-US face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" lang=EN-US face=Calibri,sans-serif>Based on our review, we are not aware 
of any material modifications that should be made to the accompanying condensed 
consolidated interim financial information for it to be in conformity with 
International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS) as issued by the 
International Accounting Standards Board (IASB).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" lang=EN-US face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" lang=EN-US face=Calibri,sans-serif>As discussed in Note 3 to the condensed
consolidated interim financial information, during the third quarter of 2014, 
the Company wrote off US$ 2,527 million of overpayments on the acquisition of 
property plant and equipment incorrectly capitalized, according to testimony 
obtained from Brazilian criminal investigations.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" lang=EN-US face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" lang=EN-US face=Calibri,sans-serif>We have previously audited, in 
accordance with the standards of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board 
(United States), the consolidated statement of financial position as of December
31, 2015, and the related consolidated statements of income, comprehensive 
income, cash flows (not presented herein) and changes in shareholders&#8217; 
equity for the year then ended, and in our report dated March 21, 2016, we 
expressed an unqualified opinion on those consolidated financial statements. In 
our opinion, the information set forth in the accompanying condensed
consolidated statement of financial position as of December 31, 2015, is fairly 
stated in all material respects in relation to the consolidated statement of 
financial position from which it has been derived.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" lang=EN-US face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" lang=PT-BR 
face=calibri,sans-serif>/s/</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" lang=PT-BR 
face=calibri,sans-serif>PricewaterhouseCoopers</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" lang=PT-BR 
face=calibri,sans-serif>Auditores Independentes</FONT></P>

face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>

face=calibri,sans-serif>Rio de Janeiro, Brazil</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" lang=EN-US 
face=calibri,sans-serif>August 11, 2016</FONT></P>

<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" 
align=right><B><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 6pt" color=black face="petrobras

style="DISPLAY: none" face="times new roman"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE:

<HR align=center SIZE=2 width="100%" noShade>
<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>
&nbsp; <A name="page_9"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader9"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. &#8211; 
Petrobras</FONT></B></P></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Notes to the financial statements</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>(Expressed in millions of US Dollars, unless otherwise 
indicated)</FONT></I></P>
<DIV style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 1pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; MARGIN: 
0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 5pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>1.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" 
face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 
</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>The Company and its operations </FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. - 
Petrobras is dedicated, directly or through its subsidiaries (referred to 
jointly as &#8220;Petrobras&#8221;, &#8220;the Company&#8221;, or 
&#8220;Petrobras Group&#8221;) to prospecting, drilling, refining, processing, 
trading and transporting crude oil from producing onshore and offshore oil 
fields and from shale or other rocks, as well as oil products, natural gas and 
other liquid hydrocarbons. In addition, Petrobras carries out energy related 
activities, such as research, development, production, transport, distribution 
and trading of all forms of energy, as well as other related or similar 
activities. The Company&#8217;s head office is located in Rio de Janeiro &#8211;
RJ, Brazil.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>2.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" 
face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 
</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>Basis of preparation of unaudited interim financial 
information</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The unaudited consolidated 
interim financial information has been prepared and is being presented in 
accordance with IAS 34 &#8211; &#8220;Interim Financial Reporting&#8221; as 
issued by the International Accounting Standards Board (IASB). The information 
is presented in U.S. dollars.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>This unaudited interim financial
information presents the significant changes in the period, avoiding repetition 
of certain notes to the financial statements previously reported. Hence it 
should be read together with the Company&#8217;s annual financial statements for
the year ended December 31, 2015, which include the full set of 
notes.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petrobras has selected the U.S. 
Dollar as its presentation currency. The financial statements have been 
translated from the functional currency (Brazilian Real) into the presentation 
currency (U.S. Dollar) in accordance with IAS 21 &#8211; &#8220;The effects of 
changes in foreign exchange rates&#8221;. All assets and liabilities are 
translated into U.S. dollars at the closing exchange rate at the date of the 
financial statements; income and expenses, as well as cash flows are translated 
into U.S. dollars using the average exchange rates prevailing during the year. 
All exchange differences arising from the translation of the consolidated 
financial statements from the functional currency into the presentation currency
are recognized as cumulative translation adjustments (CTA) within accumulated 
other comprehensive income in the consolidated statements of changes in 
shareholders&#8217; equity.</FONT></P>

medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 100%" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 
border=0>

<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Brazilian

<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt; BORDER-RIGHT: white 1pt solid; BORDER-BOTTOM:

<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt; BORDER-RIGHT: white 1pt solid; BORDER-BOTTOM:

<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"

<TR style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt">
<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=red 
face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=#548dd4 face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The Company&#8217;s Board of 
Directors in a meeting held on August 11, 2016 authorized the issuance of these 
consolidated interim financial information.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>2.1.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7pt" face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 
</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>Accounting estimates</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The preparation of interim 
financial information requires the use of estimates and assumptions for certain 
assets, liabilities and other transactions. These estimates include: oil and gas
reserves, depreciation, depletion and amortization, impairment of assets, 
pension and medical benefits liabilities, provisions for legal proceedings, 
dismantling of areas and environmental remediation, deferred income taxes, cash 
flow hedge accounting and allowance for impairment of trade receivables. 
Although our management uses assumptions and judgments that are periodically 
reviewed, the actual results could differ from these estimates.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>3.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" 
face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 
</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>The &#8220;Lava Jato (Car Wash) Operation&#8221; and its effects on the 
Company</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>In the third quarter of 2014, 
the Company wrote off US$ 2,527 of capitalized costs representing amounts that 
Petrobras overpaid for the acquisition of property, plant and equipment in prior
years. For further information see note 3 to the Company&#8217;s December 31, 
2015 audited consolidated financial statements.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>In preparing its financial
statements for the period ended June 30, 2016, the Company considered all 
available information and did not identify any additional information in the 
investigations related to the &#8220;Lava Jato&#8221; (Car </FONT>
<FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></P>
<a name="_bclFooter9"></a><DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt" align=center><FONT 
style="DISPLAY: none" face="times new roman"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt" face="times new roman"></FONT></FONT><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>9</FONT><FONT style="DISPLAY: none"><FONT lang=PT-
BR style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT><FONT></FONT></P></DIV></DIV>
<HR align=center SIZE=2 width="100%" noShade>
<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>
&nbsp; <A name="page_10"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%;">
<a name="_bclHeader10"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. &#8211; 
Petrobras</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Notes to the financial statements</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt"
face=Calibri,sans-serif>(Expressed in millions of US Dollars, unless otherwise 
indicated)</FONT></I></FONT></P>
<DIV style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 1pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; MARGIN: 
0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in"><FONT><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 5pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Wash) Operation by the Brazilian
authorities or by the independent law firms conducting an internal investigation
that could materially impact or change the methodology adopted to recognize the 
write-off. The Company will continuously monitor the investigations for 
additional information and will review its potential impacts on the adjustment 
made.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>As of June 30, 2016, the Company
has recovered US$ 106 through leniency agreements, of which US$&nbsp;83 were 
received in 2015. The amounts recovered were recognized as other income (amounts
recovered &#8211; &#8220;overpayments incorrectly 
capitalized&#8221;).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Additionally, on July 15, 2016, 
the Ministry of Transparency, Oversight and Control (Minist&#233;rio da 
Transpar&#234;ncia, Fiscaliza&#231;&#227;o e Controle &#8211; 
&#8220;MTFC&#8221;), the Public Prosecutor&#8217;s Office (Minist&#233;rio 
P&#250;blico Federal &#8211; &#8220;MPF&#8221;), the General Counsel for the 
Republic (Advocacia Geral da Uni&#227;o &#8211; &#8220;AGU&#8221;) and SBM 
Offshore, signed a leniency agreement through which the Dutch company will pay 
compensation of US$ 342 , of which US$ 328&nbsp; will be reimbursed to Petrobras
as follows: (i) the first installment of US$ 129&nbsp; will be paid as soon as 
the agreement becomes effective; (ii) the second and third installments will be 
paid 12 and 24 months after the signature of the agreement&nbsp; in the amount 
of US$ 10&nbsp; each; (iii) the remaining US$ 179 will be deducted from future 
payments owed by the Company to SBM pursuant to existing contracts.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>To the extent that any of the 
proceedings resulting from the Lava Jato investigation involve new leniency 
agreements with cartel members or plea agreements with individuals pursuant to 
which they agree to return funds, Petrobras may be entitled to receive a portion
of such funds and will recognize them as other income when received.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>4.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" 
face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 
</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>Basis of consolidation</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The consolidated interim 
financial information includes the interim information of Petrobras, its 
subsidiaries, joint operations and consolidated structured entities.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>There were no significant 
changes in the consolidated entities in the six-month period ended June 30, 
2016, except for the assets and liabilities of the subsidiary Petrobras 
Argentina S.A. &#8211; PESA, which are classified as held for sale, as set out 
in note 9.1.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>5.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" 
face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 
</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>Summary of significant accounting policies</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The same accounting policies and
methods of computation were followed in these consolidated interim financial 
statements as those followed in the preparation of the annual financial 
statements of the Company for the year ended December 31, 2015.</FONT></P>

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=#548dd4 face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Short-term financial investments
in Brazil comprise investment in funds holding Brazilian Federal Government 
Bonds. Short-term financial investments abroad are comprised of time deposits 
with maturities of three months or less, highly-liquid automatic investing 
accounts, interest checking accounts and other short-term fixed income 
instruments.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 
0in"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>Marketable securities</FONT></B></P>

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=red 
face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=#548dd4 face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Trading securities refer mainly 
to investments in Brazilian Federal Government Bonds. These financial 
investments have maturities of more than three months and are mostly classified 
as current assets due to their maturity or the expectation of their realization 
in the short term.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt">&nbsp;</P>

style="DISPLAY: none" face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE:
11pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT 
lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif>11</FONT></FONT><FONT

style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT><FONT

face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US

<TD style="HEIGHT: 9.75pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-

<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US

<TD style="HEIGHT: 9.75pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-

<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 9.75pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="9%">
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=red 
face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=#548dd4 face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>As of June 30, 2016, US$ 2,130 
of the Company&#8217;s net trade receivables from the isolated electricity 
system in the northern region of Brazil related to the sale of fuel oil, natural
gas, electricity and other products to thermoelectric power plants (which are 
subsidiaries of Eletrobras), state-owned natural gas distribution companies and 
independent electricity producers (</FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Produtores Independentes de Energia &#8211; 
PIE</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>)
operating in that region, were classified as non-current assets. The balance of 
those receivables was US$ 3,133 as of June 30, 2016 (US$ 2,543 as of December 
31, 2015).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>A significant portion of the 
funds used by those companies to pay for products supplied by the Company came 
from the Fuel Consumption Account (</FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Conta de Consumo de Combust&#237;vel &#8211; 
CCC</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>), which provides funds to cover a portion of the costs related to the 
supply of fuel to thermoelectric power plants located in the northern region of 
Brazil (operating in the isolated electricity system). However, as a result of 
changes in the </FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>CCC </FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>regulations over time, funds transferred from the 
</FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>CCC</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif> to these electricity companies have not been sufficient for them to meet 
their financial obligations and, as a result, some have not been able to pay for
the products supplied by Petrobras.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>In 2012, a new legislation 
(Provisional Measure 579 of September 11, 2012, revoked by Law No. 12.783/2013) 
significantly changed the sources of funds that were used to cover the cost of 
electricity generated in the Isolated Electricity System and the Brazilian 
Federal Government started to provide funds to cover costs that in the past 
</FONT>
<FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></P>
<a name="_bclFooter13"></a><DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=center><FONT 
style="DISPLAY: none" face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE:
11pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT 
lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif>13</FONT></FONT><FONT
face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT style="DISPLAY: none"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT><FONT 
face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></P></DIV></DIV>
<HR align=center SIZE=2 width="100%" noShade>

&nbsp; <A name="page_14"></A>

<a name="_bclHeader14"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. &#8211; 
Petrobras</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Notes to the financial statements</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt"
face=Calibri,sans-serif>(Expressed in millions of US Dollars, unless otherwise 
indicated)</FONT></I></FONT></P>
<DIV style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 1pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; MARGIN: 
0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in"><FONT><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 5pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>were only borne by the 
</FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>CCC</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>. This assistance from the Federal Government would be made available 
through funds deposited in the Energy Development Account (</FONT><I><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Conta de 
Desenvolvimento Energ&#233;tico </FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>&#8211; </FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>CDE</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>) by the Brazilian National Treasury. Those 
funds, however, proved to be insufficient to cover the operational costs of the 
isolated electricity system in the northern region of Brazil.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The funds available in the
</FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>CCC</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>, which were already insufficient to cover the costs related to fuel 
supplied by the Company, decreased significantly. Following an increase in the 
amounts owed by the thermoelectric power plants operating in the Isolated 
Electricity System, the Company put pressure on the negotiations with the state-
owned natural gas distribution companies, the independent electricity producers 
(</FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>PIEs</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>), subsidiaries of Eletrobras and other private companies. On December 31,
2014, the Company entered into a debt acknowledgement agreement with 
subsidiaries of Eletrobras with respect to the balance of its receivables as of 
November 30, 2014. Eletrobras acknowledged it owed US$ 2,202 to the Company. 
This amount is being adjusted monthly based on the Selic interest rate 
(Brazilian short-term interest rate). Under this agreement, the first of 120 
monthly installments was paid in February 2015 and these payments have 
continued. As of May 7, 2015, US$ 1,889 had been guaranteed by the 
collateralization of certain amounts payable by the </FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>CDE </FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>to the </FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>CCC</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>In early 2015, the Brazilian 
government reviewed its electricity price regulations and implemented a new 
pricing policy for the electricity sector, which has resulted in increases in 
the tariffs charged to end-customers since the first quarter of 2015. The 
Company had expected that this new policy would have strengthened the financial 
situation of the companies in the electricity sector and, consequently to reduce
the balance of their accounts payable with respect to fuel oil and other 
products supplied by the Company, which has not occurred. Despite the increase 
in amount of electricity tariffs to end-users of electricity distributors in 
order to provide financial stability to these companies, the recovery flow of 
CCC funds has occurred slowly, delaying the reimbursements for fuel acquisition 
costs provided by Petrobras and deteriorating the default of those customers to 
the Company.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Pursuant to the issuance of 
Normative Instruction 679 on September 1, 2015 by the Brazilian National 
Electricity Agency (Ag&#234;ncia Nacional de Energia El&#233;trica - ANEEL), the
Company expected that the flow of funds it would receive from the CCC would 
accelerate. This is because funds would be paid directly from the CCC for 
products supplied in the prior month with a limit of 75% of the average payments
made by the CCC in the previous three months. However, it has not occurred and, 
therefore, the insolvency of these receivables increased and these receivables 
continue to be delinquent.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>In 2015, the Company recognized 
US$ 564 as allowance for impairment of trade receivables (net of reversals) due 
to frustrated negotiations to enter into additional debt acknowledgement 
agreements and new pledges of receivables from the CDE.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>In the six-month period ended 
June 30, 2016, the Company recognized an allowance for impairment of trade 
receivables (net of reversals) in the amount of US$&nbsp;253, mainly related to 
new supplies of: (i) fuel oil by legal enforcement (injunction) in the first 
quarter of 2016; and (ii) natural gas, mainly in the second quarter of 2016. In 
July 2016, the AME paid part of receivables maturing in May and June 2016 in 
amount of US$&nbsp;58, therefore no allowance for impairment was recognized 
concerning this amount.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Accordingly, the Company adopted
the following measures:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt 14.2pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
-14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>judicial collection of overdue receivables with 
respect to natural gas supplied to AME, Eletrobras and Cig&#225;s;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt 14.2pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
-14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>judicial collection of overdue 
receivables with respect to fuel oil supplied by the whole owned subsidiary BR 
Distribuidora to companies of Eletrobras Group (Amazonas, Acre, Rond&#244;nia 
and Roraima);</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt 14.2pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
-14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>partial suspension of gas supply;</FONT></P>
<a name="_bclFooter14"></a><DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=center><FONT 
style="DISPLAY: none" face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE:
11pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT 
lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif>14</FONT></FONT><FONT
face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT style="DISPLAY: none"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT><FONT 
face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></P></DIV></DIV>
<HR align=center SIZE=2 width="100%" noShade>
<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>
&nbsp; <A name="page_15"></A>

<a name="_bclHeader15"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. &#8211; 
Petrobras</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Notes to the financial statements</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt"
face=Calibri,sans-serif>(Expressed in millions of US Dollars, unless otherwise 
indicated)</FONT></I></FONT></P>
<DIV style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt 14.2pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
-14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>suspension of fuel oil supply, except when legally
enforced; and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt 14.2pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
-14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new

as delinquent companies in Brazilian Central Bank files and registration of AME 
as a delinquent company in ANEEL files.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt

<TD style="BORDER-TOP: #008542 1pt solid; HEIGHT: 11.45pt; BACKGROUND: 
#eaf1dd; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 
0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="13%">
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" 
align=right><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">7,457</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 11.45pt; PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE: avoid">
<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.45pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-

<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-

<TD style="HEIGHT: 12pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT:
3pt; BORDER-LEFT: white 2.75pt solid; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom 
width="13%">

SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=red 
face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=#548dd4 face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Inventories are presented net of
a US$&nbsp;36 allowance reducing inventories to net realizable value (US$ 155 as
of December 31, 2015), mainly due to changes in international prices of crude 
oil and oil products. In the six-month period ended June 30, 2016, the Company 
recognized as cost of sales a US$ 322 allowance charge reducing inventories to 
net realizable value (US$ 19 in the same period of 2015).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>A portion of the crude oil 
and/or oil products inventories have been pledged as security for the Terms of 
Financial Commitment (TFC) signed by Petrobras and Petros in the amount of 
US$&nbsp;1,951 (US$ 1,719 as of December 31, 2015), as set out in note 
21.1.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>9.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" 
face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 
</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>Disposal of Assets </FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The Company&#8217;s 2015-2019 
Business and Management Plan forecasts a dynamic portfolio of partnerships and 
divestments during the two years period of 2015-2016, subject to market and 
business conditions during the negotiations, which can change in accordance with
the ongoing Company&#8217;s business analysis and also with the external 
environment. Accordingly, the conditions to recognize assets and liabilities as 
held for sale are achieved only when the Board of Directors approves a 
disposal.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>9.1.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7pt" face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 
</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>Sale of Petrobras Argentina</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>On May 12, 2016, the Board of 
Directors approved the disposal of the Company&#8217;s entire 67.19% interest in
Petrobras Argentina -PESA, owned through the subsidiary Petrobras 
Participaciones S.L. (&#8220;PPSL&#8221;), to Pampa Energ&#237;a, in the amount 
of US$ 892, without taking into account the effect of price adjustments and tax 
impact. This transaction was concluded (still subject to adjustments) on July 
27. 2016, as set out in note 33.3.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>9.2.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7pt" face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 
</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>Termination of the contract for the sale of Bijupir&#225; and Salema 
fields (BJS)</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>On February 26, 2016, Petro Rio 
S.A. terminated the contracts signed with the Company on July 1, 2015, for the 
sale of a 20% interest in Bijupir&#225; and Salema concessions (BJS) and in the 
Dutch joint operation BJS Oil Operations </FONT>
<FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>B.V. (BJSOO 
BV). Accordingly, the amounts related to these fields were reclassified from 
assets and liabilities held for sale back to property, plant and equipment 
(US$&nbsp;148) and to provision for decommissioning costs (US$&nbsp;126), 
respectively, plus interest.</FONT></P>
<a name="_bclFooter15"></a><DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=center><FONT 
style="DISPLAY: none" face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE:
11pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT 
lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif>15</FONT></FONT><FONT
face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT style="DISPLAY: none"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT><FONT 
face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-

<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. &#8211; 
Petrobras</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Notes to the financial statements</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt"
face=Calibri,sans-serif>(Expressed in millions of US Dollars, unless otherwise 
indicated)</FONT></I></FONT></P>
<DIV style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 1pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; MARGIN: 
0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in"><FONT><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 5pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Due to the aforementioned 
reclassification, the respective assets were depreciated based on their 
historical data and their recoverable amounts were reassessed. As a result, the 
Company recognized an impairment loss as set out in note 13.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The market value of these shares
does not necessarily reflect the realizable value upon sale of a large block of 
shares.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 
0in"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Braskem
S.A. - Investment in publicly traded associate:</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Braskem&#8217;s shares are 
publicly traded on stock exchanges in Brazil and abroad. As of June 30, 2016 the
quoted market value of the Company&#8217;s investment in Braskem was US$ 1,509 
based on the quoted values of both Petrobras&#8217; interest in Braskem&#8217;s 
common stock (47% of the outstanding shares), and preferred stock (22% of the 
</FONT>
<FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></P>
<a name="_bclFooter17"></a><DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=center><FONT 
style="DISPLAY: none" face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE:
11pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT 
lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif>17</FONT></FONT><FONT
face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT style="DISPLAY: none"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT><FONT 
face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></P></DIV></DIV>

&nbsp; <A name="page_18"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%;">
<a name="_bclHeader18"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. &#8211; 
Petrobras</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Notes to the financial statements</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt"
face=Calibri,sans-serif>(Expressed in millions of US Dollars, unless otherwise
indicated)</FONT></I></FONT></P>
<DIV style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 1pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; MARGIN: 
0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in"><FONT><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 5pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>outstanding shares). However, 
there is extremely limited trading of the common shares, since non-signatories 
of the shareholders&#8217; agreement hold only approximately 3% of the common 
shares.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Given the operational 
relationship between Petrobras and Braskem, on December 31, 2015, the 
recoverable amount of the investment for impairment testing purposes was 
determined based on value in use, considering future cash flow projections and 
the manner in which the Company can derive value from this investment via 
dividends and other distributions to arrive at its value in use. As the 
recoverable amount was higher than the carrying amount, no impairment losses 
were recognized for this investment.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The main assumptions on which 
cash flow projections were based to determine Braskem&#8217;s value in use are 
set out in note 14 to the Company&#8217;s consolidated financial statements for 
the year ended December 31, 2015.</FONT></P>

28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt">&nbsp;</P>

style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=#000000 face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">(**)

<TD style="HEIGHT: 12pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT:

<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">(***) 
Includes US$ 1,073 transferred to assets classified as held for sale due to the 
disposal of PESA, as set out in note 9.1.</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 12pt">
<TD style="HEIGHT: 12pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT:
3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="43%">
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 12pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT:
3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="12%">
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 12pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT:
3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="11%">
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 12pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT:
3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="11%">
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 12pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT:
3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="12%">
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 12pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT:
3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="11%">
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" 
align=right><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=red 
face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=#548dd4 face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>As of June 30, 2016, property, 
plant and equipment include assets under finance leases of US$ 58 (US$ 48 as of 
December 31, 2015).</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>11.2.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7pt" face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Concession for exploration of 
oil and natural gas - Assignment Agreement (&#8220;Cess&#227;o 
Onerosa&#8221;)</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petrobras and the Brazilian 
Federal Government entered into the Assignment Agreement in 2010, which grants 
the Company the right to carry out prospection and drilling activities for oil, 
natural gas and other liquid hydrocarbons located in the pre-salt area limited 
to the production of five billion barrels of oil equivalent in up to 40 years 
and renewable for a further five years subject to certain conditions. As of June
30, 2016, the Company&#8217;s </FONT>
<FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></P>
<a name="_bclFooter19"></a><DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=center><FONT 
style="DISPLAY: none" face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE:
11pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT 
lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif>19</FONT></FONT><FONT
face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT style="DISPLAY: none"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT><FONT 
face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></P></DIV></DIV>
<HR align=center SIZE=2 width="100%" noShade>
<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>
&nbsp; <A name="page_20"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%;">
<a name="_bclHeader20"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. &#8211; 
Petrobras</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Notes to the financial statements</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt"
face=Calibri,sans-serif>(Expressed in millions of US Dollars, unless otherwise 
indicated)</FONT></I></FONT></P>
<DIV style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 1pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; MARGIN: 
0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in"><FONT><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 5pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>property, plant and equipment 
includes the amount of US$&nbsp;23,306 related to the Assignment Agreement 
(US$&nbsp;19,158 as of December 31, 2015).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petrobras has already declared 
commerciality in fields of all six blocks in the scope of this agreement: Franco
(B&#250;zios), Florim (Itapu), Nordeste de Tupi (S&#233;pia), Entorno de Iara 
(Norte de Berbig&#227;o, Sul de Berbig&#227;o, Norte de Sururu, Sul de Sururu, 
Atapu), Sul de Guar&#225; (Sul de Sapinho&#225;) and Sul de Tupi (Sul de 
Lula).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The agreement establishes that 
the review procedures of the agreement will commence immediately after the 
declaration of commerciality for each area and must be based on independent 
technical appraisal reports. The review of the Assignment Agreement will be 
concluded after the review of all the areas. However, no specific date has been 
established for the review procedures to be concluded.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>If the review of the Assignment 
Agreement determines that the value of acquired rights is greater than initially
paid, the Company may be required to pay the difference to the Federal 
Government, or may proportionally reduce the total volume of barrels acquired 
under the agreement. If the review determines that the value of the acquired 
rights is lower than initially paid by the Company, the Federal Government will 
reimburse the Company for the difference by delivering cash or bonds or 
equivalent means of payment, subject to budgetary regulations.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The formal review procedures for
each block are based on costs incurred through the exploration stage and 
estimated costs and production levels included in the independent technical 
appraisal reports. The review of the Assignment Agreement may result in changes 
in: (i) the amount of the agreement; (ii) the total volume (in barrels of oil) 
to be produced; (iii) the term of the agreement; and (iv) the minimum 
percentages of local content. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The appraisal assumptions for 
the blocks in the scope of the Assignment Agreement are still under negotiation 
with the Brazilian Federal Government and the final amount to be established for
this Agreement still lacks: (i) assumptions validation; (ii) independent 
technical appraisal reports and (iii) the outcome of the 
negotiations.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt">&nbsp;</P>
<a name="_bclFooter20"></a><DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=center><FONT 
style="DISPLAY: none" face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE:
11pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT 
lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif>20</FONT></FONT><FONT
face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT style="DISPLAY: none"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT><FONT 
face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></P></DIV></DIV>

<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>
&nbsp; <A name="page_22"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader22"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. &#8211; 
Petrobras</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Notes to the financial statements</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt"
face=Calibri,sans-serif>(Expressed in millions of US Dollars, unless otherwise 
indicated)</FONT></I></FONT></P>
<DIV style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 1pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; MARGIN: 
0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in"><FONT><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 5pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>13.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt"
face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 
</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>Impairment</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The Company&#8217;s assets are 
tested for impairment on December 31, annually, or when there is an indication 
that their carrying amount may not be recoverable. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>In the first half of 2016, 
impairment losses (net of reversals) were recognized as other expenses, net, in 
the amount of US$ 412, mainly due to:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>a) COMPERJ &#8211; Reassessment 
of this project that confirmed its postponement until December 2020 (first 
refining unit) with continuous efforts to seek new partnerships to its 
resumption. The construction of Comperj facilities related to natural gas 
processing plant (UPGN) will be continued, since they are part of the transport 
and processing of natural gas from the pre-salt layer in Santos Basin 
infrastructure. However, the estimated costs and period of time to complete 
these facilities constructions were revised and, therefore, the Company 
recognized an impairment charge of the project remaining balance (US$&nbsp;320) 
as of June 30, 2016.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>b) Bijupir&#225; and Salema 
&#8211;due to the termination of the sale contract of these fields on February 
26, 2016, their related assets and liabilities, previously classified as held 
for sale, were reclassified, triggering reassessments of the respective 
recoverable amounts. Accordingly, an impairment charge of US$ 82 was 
recognized.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>In the first half of 2015, 
considering changes in circumstances and projections, projects removed from the 
2015-2019 Business and Management Plan were also removed from their cash-
generating units as previously set out in the Company&#8217;s financial 
statements for the year ended December 31, 2014 (when those assets had not 
suffered impairment losses).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Based on the assessment of the 
recoverable amount of such assets (tested for impairment individually), an 
impairment charge of US$ 419 was recognized as other expenses in the second 
quarter of 2015, mainly for: (i) Nitrogen Fertilizer Plant - UFN-V (US$ 190); 
(ii) RTM assets (US$ 118) and (iii) E&amp;P producing properties in Brazil 
(several CGUs) and assets held for sale (US$ 81).</FONT></P>
<P style="BACKGROUND: white; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; 
MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>14.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US
style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Exploration for and evaluation 
of oil and gas reserves</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The exploration and evaluation 
activities include the search for oil and gas reserves from obtaining the legal 
rights to explore a specific area to the declaration of the technical and 
commercial viability of the reserves. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Changes in the balances of 
capitalized costs directly associated with exploratory wells pending 
determination of proved reserves and the balance of amounts paid for obtaining 
rights and concessions for exploration of oil and natural gas (capitalized 
acquisition costs) are set out in the following table:</FONT></P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 100%" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 
border=0>

<TR style="HEIGHT: 11.45pt">

<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.45pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-

<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" 
align=right><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">5,201</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.45pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="13%">
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" 
align=right><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=#548dd4 face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>16.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt"
face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 
</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>Finance debt</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The Company obtains funding 
through debt financing for capital expenditures to develop crude oil and natural
gas producing properties, construct vessels and pipelines, construct and expand 
industrial plants, among other uses. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The Company has covenants that 
were not in default on June, 30 2016 in its loan agreements and notes issued in 
the capital markets requiring, among other obligations, the presentation of 
interim financial statements within 90 days of the end of each quarter (not 
reviewed by independent auditors) and audited financial statements within 120 
days of the end of each fiscal year. Non-compliance with these obligations do 
not represent immediate events of default and the grace period in which the 
Company has to deliver these financial statements ranges from 30 to 60 days, 
depending on the agreement. The Company also has covenants with respect to debt 
level in some of its loan agreements with the Brazilian Development Bank 
(</FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>Banco Nacional de Desenvolvimento</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif> - BNDES).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>A roll-forward schedule of non-
current debt is set out as follows:</FONT></P>

style="DISPLAY: none" face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE:
11pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT 
lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif>23</FONT></FONT><FONT

28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>16.1.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7pt" face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Summarized information on

<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-

currencies:</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.45pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM:

<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt;
BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=red 
face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=#548dd4 face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 
12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The fair 
value of the Company's finance debt is determined primarily by quoted prices in 
active markets for identical liabilities (level 1), when applicable, amounting 
to US$ 46,430 as of June 30, 2016. When a quoted price for an identical 
liability is not available, the finance debt is fair valued by a discounted cash
flow based on a theoretical curve derived from the yield curve of the Company's 
most liquid bonds (level 2), amounting to US$&nbsp;65,951 as of June 30, 
2016.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 
12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The 
sensitivity analysis for financial instruments subject to foreign exchange 
variation is set out in note 31.2.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>16.2.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7pt" face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>&nbsp;Capitalization rate used 
to determine the amount of borrowing costs eligible for 
capitalization</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The capitalization rate used to 
determine the amount of borrowing costs eligible for capitalization was the 
weighted average of the borrowing costs applicable to the borrowings that were 
outstanding during the period, other than borrowings made specifically for the 
purpose of obtaining a qualifying asset. In the first half of 2016 the 
capitalization rate was 5.38% p.a. (4.93% p.a. in the first half of 
2015).</FONT></P>

style="DISPLAY: none" face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE:
11pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT 
lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif>25</FONT></FONT><FONT
face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT style="DISPLAY: none"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT><FONT

<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt"
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. &#8211; 
Petrobras</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Notes to the financial statements</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt"
face=Calibri,sans-serif>(Expressed in millions of US Dollars, unless otherwise 
indicated)</FONT></I></FONT></P>

windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 1pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; MARGIN: 
0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in"><FONT><FONT lang=EN-

serif></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt"

serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>

LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="13%">
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" 
align=right><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 12.75pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="12%">
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" 
align=right><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 12.75pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="12%">
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" 
align=right><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=red 
face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=#548dd4 face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>16.4.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7pt" face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Collateral</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Most of the Company&#8217;s debt
is unsecured, however, collateral is granted to financial institutions if 
required. There are also certain debts agreements of the subsidiary Petrobras 
Distribuidora are based on the Company&#8217;s future exports.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The loans obtained by structured
entities are collateralized based on the projects&#8217; assets, as well as
liens on receivables of the structured entities. Certain wholly-owned 
subsidiaries issue securities that are fully and unconditionally guaranteed by 
Petrobras ( as set out in note 34).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The global notes issued by the 
Company in the international capital market through its wholly-owned subsidiary 
Petrobras Global Trading &#8211; PGF are unsecured global notes, however 
Petrobras fully, unconditionally and irrevocably guarantees these notes. In 
addition, there were no changes in the structure of collateralization with 
respect to the last global notes offering in the international capital market 
occurred in May 2016. </FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt">&nbsp;</P>
<a name="_bclFooter26"></a><DIV>

<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" 
align=right><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 3.95pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="12%">

<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">(*) For 
comparative purposes, the present value of payments in the amount of US$ 7 was 
reclassified from trade payables in current liabilities and the amount of US$ 46
was reclassified from others in non-current liabilities.</FONT></P></TD></TR>

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:

BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=red 
face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=#548dd4 face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>17.2.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7pt" face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Future minimum lease payments 
&#8211; operating leases</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Operating leases mainly include 
oil and gas production units, drilling rigs and other exploration and production
equipment, vessels and support vessels, helicopters, land and building 
leases.</FONT></P>
