face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=#548dd4 face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>As of June 30, 2016, the balance
of estimated future minimum lease payments under operating leases includes US$ 
56,438 (US$ 60,628 as of December 31, 2015) with respect to assets under 
construction, for which the lease term has not commenced.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>In the first half of 2016, the 
Company recognized expenditures of US$ 4,856 (US$ 5,233 in the first half of 
2015) for operating leases installments.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>18.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt"
face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 
</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>Related-party transactions</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The Company has a related-party 
transactions policy, approved by its Board of Directors, which establishes rules
to ensure that all decisions involving related parties and potential conflicts 
of interest take into account applicable laws in the countries in which the 
Company operates and the parties involved in negotiations.</FONT></P>
<a name="_bclFooter27"></a><DIV>

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>In the first half of 2016 the 
board members and officers of the Petrobras group received US$ 10.3 as 
compensation (US$ 10.5 in the first half of 2015).</FONT></P>

&nbsp; <A name="page_29"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader29"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. &#8211; 
Petrobras</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Notes to the financial statements</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt"
face=Calibri,sans-serif>(Expressed in millions of US Dollars, unless otherwise 
indicated)</FONT></I></FONT></P>
<DIV style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 1pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; MARGIN: 
0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in"><FONT><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 5pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The compensation of the Advisory
Committees to the Board of Directors is apart from the fixed compensation set 
for the Board members and, therefore, has not been classified under compensation
of Petrobras&#8217; key management.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The alternates of Board members,
who were also members of these committees up to April 2016, received the amount 
of US$ 14 thousand as compensation in 2016 (US$ 17 thousand including related 
charges).</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt"

align=right><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras

style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="9%">

style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="9%">

style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-

<a name="_bclFooter29"></a><DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=center><FONT 
style="DISPLAY: none" face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE:
11pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT 
lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif>29</FONT></FONT><FONT
face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT style="DISPLAY: none"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT><FONT 
face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></P></DIV></DIV>
<HR align=center SIZE=2 width="100%" noShade>
<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>
<a name="page_30"></a><a name="_bclPageBorder30"></a><DIV STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 0%; PADDING-LEFT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader30"></a><DIV>
<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><b><font face=Calibri,sans-serif 
lang=PT-BR style="font-size:14.0pt;">Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. &#8211; 
Petrobras</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font face=Calibri,sans-serif 
lang=PT-BR style="font-size:12.0pt;">Notes to the financial 
statements</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font style=""><i><font 
face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">(Expressed in 
millions of US Dollars, unless otherwise indicated)</font></i></font></p>
<div style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 
1.0pt 0in;">
<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;padding:0in;"><font 
style=""><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-
size:5.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
</div>
</DIV>
<p style="margin-bottom:12.0pt;margin-left:28.35pt;margin-right:0in;margin-
top:12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:justify;text-indent:-
28.35pt;"><b><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-
size:12.0pt;">20.2.</font></b><b><font face="times new roman" lang=EN-US 
style="font-size:7.0pt;">&nbsp;&nbsp; </font></b><b><font face=Calibri,sans-
serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:12.0pt;">Brazilian Tax Law</font></b></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:12.0pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-
top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US 
style="font-size:11.0pt;">On December 30, 2015, the state of
Rio de Janeiro enacted two laws that increased the tax burden on the oil
industry as of March 2016, as follows:</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:12.0pt;margin-left:14.2pt;margin-right:0in;margin-
top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-14.2pt;"><font face=symbol lang=EN-US 
style="font-size:11.0pt;">&#183;</font><font face="times new roman" lang=EN-US 
style="font-size:7.0pt;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</font><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:11.0pt;">Law 
No. 7,182 &#8211; establishes a Rate Control,
Monitoring and Supervision of Research, Mining, Oil and Gas Exploration and
Utilization Activities tax (</font><i><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US 
style="font-size:11.0pt;">Taxa de Controle, Monitoramento e 
Fiscaliza&#231;&#227;o
das Atividades de Pesquisa, Lavra, Explora&#231;&#227;o e Aproveitamento de 
Petr&#243;leo e
G&#225;s</font></i><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-
size:11.0pt;"> &#8211; TFPG) over each barrel of crude oil or equivalent unit of
natural gas
extracted in the State of Rio de Janeiro, and</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:12.0pt;margin-left:14.2pt;margin-right:0in;margin-
top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-14.2pt;"><font face=symbol lang=EN-US 
style="font-size:11.0pt;">&#183;</font><font face="times new roman" lang=EN-US 
style="font-size:7.0pt;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</font><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:11.0pt;">Law 
No. 7,183 &#8211; establishes a VAT (ICMS) tax over
transactions involving crude oil operations.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:12.0pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-
top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US 
style="font-size:11.0pt;">The Company believes that the
taxation established by both laws is not legally sustainable, and therefore,
the Company has supported the Brazilian Association of Companies for the
Exploration and Production of Oil and Gas (ABEP - </font><i><font 
face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-
size:11.0pt;">Associa&#231;&#227;o Brasileira de
Empresas de Explora&#231;&#227;o e Produ&#231;&#227;o de Petr&#243;leo e 
G&#225;s</font></i><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-
size:11.0pt;">), which has filed
complaints challenging the constitutionality of such laws before the Brazilian
Supreme Court.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:12.0pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-
top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US 
style="font-size:11.0pt;">The Brazilian Federal Attorney has
expressed favorable opinions regarding the basis of the ABEP complaints and the
granting of judicial injunctions in favor of the oil and gas industry, aiming
to avoid the respective tax burden on it.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:12.0pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-
top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US 
style="font-size:11.0pt;">The Brazilian Supreme Court is
currently analyzing the ABEP request for formal injunctions in both 
actions.</font></p>
<a name="_bclFooter30"></a><DIV>
<p align=center style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-
align:center;"><font face=calibri,sans-serif style="display:none;"><font 
face=calibri,sans-serif lang=PT-BR style="font-size:11.0pt;"></font></font><font
face=calibri,sans-serif style=""><font face=calibri,sans-serif lang=PT-BR 
style="font-size:12.0pt;">30</font></font><font face=calibri,sans-serif 
style=""><font style="display:none;"><font face=calibri,sans-serif lang=PT-BR 
style="font-size:12.0pt;"></font></font></font><font face=calibri,sans-serif 
style=""></font><font face=calibri,sans-serif style=""></font></p>
</DIV>
</DIV><HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size=2><DIV STYLE="page-break-
before: always">&nbsp;</div>
&nbsp; <A name="page_31"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader31"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. &#8211; 
Petrobras</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Notes to the financial statements</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt"
face=Calibri,sans-serif>(Expressed in millions of US Dollars, unless otherwise 
indicated)</FONT></I></FONT></P>
<DIV style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 1pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; MARGIN: 
0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in"><FONT><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 5pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>20.3.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7pt" face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Deferred income taxes - non-
current</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Income taxes in Brazil comprise 
corporate income tax (IRPJ) and social contribution on net income (CSLL). 
Brazilian statutory corporate tax rates are 25% and 9%, respectively. The 
changes in the deferred income taxes are presented as follows:</FONT></P>
<DIV align=left>

<TD style="BORDER-TOP: #008542 1pt solid; HEIGHT: 12pt; BORDER-BOTTOM:

<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"

<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-

<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" 
align=right><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="7%">
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" 
align=right><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=red 
face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=#548dd4 face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The Company recognizes the 
deferred tax assets based on projections of taxable profits in future periods 
that are revised annually. The deferred tax assets will be realized in a ten 
years perspective to the extent of provisions realization and final resolution 
of future events, both based on Business and Management Plan &#8211; BMP 
assumptions.</FONT></P>
<a name="_bclFooter31"></a><DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT><FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>

7pt" face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US

</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" face=Calibri,sans-

<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt"

7pt" face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Pension and medical 
benefits</FONT></B></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 
12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The 
Company sponsors defined benefit and variable contribution pension plans in 
Brazil and abroad, as well as defined-benefit medical plans for employees in 
Brazil (active and retirees) and their dependents. See note 22 to the 
consolidated financial statement for the year ended December 31, 2015 for 
detailed information about pension and medical benefits sponsored by the 
Company. </FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in

align=right><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>As of June 30, 2016, the Company
had pledged crude oil and/or oil products totaling US$ 1,951, which have been 
reviewed, as collateral for the Terms of Financial Commitment (TFC) signed by 
Petrobras and Petros in 2008 (US$&nbsp;1,719 as of December 31, 
2015).</FONT></P>

&nbsp; <A name="page_34"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader34"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. &#8211; 
Petrobras</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Notes to the financial statements</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt"
face=Calibri,sans-serif>(Expressed in millions of US Dollars, unless otherwise 
indicated)</FONT></I></FONT></P>
<DIV style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 1pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; MARGIN: 
0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in"><FONT><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 5pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>In the first half of 2016, the 
Company's contribution to the defined contribution portion of the Petros Plan 2 
was US$ 113 (US$ 145 in the first half of 2015) recognized in the results of the
period.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>21.2.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7pt" face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Voluntary Separation Incentive 
Plan</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Since February 2014, the Company
has implemented voluntary separation incentive plans aiming to adjust the size 
of the workforce and to achieve cost optimization as set out in the Business and
Management Plan, as described below:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt 14.2pt; TEXT-INDENT:
-14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petrobras (PIDV 2014) &#8211; the enrollment 
period occurred from February 12 to March 31, 2014. This plan was re-opened for 
eligible employees from November 30 to December 18, 2015 and, as a result, 6,779
separations of 7,219 total enrollments were made up to June 30, 2016.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt 14.2pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
-14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petrobras Distribuidora S.A. (PIDV BR 2014) 
&#8211; the enrollment period occurred from February 12 to March 31, 2014 and, 
as a result, 656 separations of 658 total enrollments were made up to June 30, 
2016.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt 14.2pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
-14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petrobras Distribuidora S.A. (PIDV BR 2015) 
&#8211; the enrollment period occurred from October 13 to December 31, 2015 and,
as a result, 316 separations of 317 total enrollments were made up to June 30, 
2016.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt 14.2pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
-14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petrobras PIDV 2016 &#8211; the enrollment period 
is from April 1, 2016 to August 31, 2016. The PIDV 2016 is open to all employees
and the recognition of the provision for expenditure on this plan will occur 
proportionally to the enrollment of the workforce. As of June 30, 4,087 
employees have enrolled to this program and 662 separations were 
made.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 
12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>Therefore, 8,413 voluntary separations of employees who enrolled in these 
plans were made as of June 30, 2016.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 
12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Changes 
in the provision during the first half of 2016 are set out as 
follows:</FONT></P>

SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Non-
current</FONT></P></TD>

<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt

</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>Shareholders&#8217; equity</FONT></B></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>22.1.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7pt" face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Share capital (net of share 
issuance costs)</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>As of June 30, 2016 subscribed 
and fully paid share capital was US$&nbsp;107,380 and share issuance costs were 
US$ 279, represented by 7,442,454,142 outstanding common shares and 
5,602,042,788 outstanding preferred shares, all of which are registered, book-
entry shares with no par value.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Preferred shares have priority 
on returns of capital, do not grant any voting rights and are non-convertible 
into common shares.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>22.2.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7pt" face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Other comprehensive 
income</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>In the first half of 2016 the 
Company recognized the following charges, mainly as a result of a 17.8% 
appreciation of the Brazilian </FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt"
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Real</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif> against the U.S. dollar:</FONT></P>

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt 14.2pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
-14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>-
</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-

10,462; and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt 14.2pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
-14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>-

roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Foreign exchange variation gains of 
US$&nbsp;13,199 (US$&nbsp;8,712 after taxes and amounts reclassified to the 
statement of income) recognized in the Company's shareholders' equity during the
first half of 2016, as a result of its cash flow hedge accounting policy. The 
cumulative balance of foreign exchange variation losses as of June 30, 2016 was 
US$&nbsp;17,539 (US$&nbsp;11,576 after taxes), as set out in note 
31.2.</FONT></P>

<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="13%">

align=right><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt">

LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="74%">

face=Calibri,sans-serif>Notes to the financial statements</FONT></P>

&nbsp; <A name="page_38"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader38"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. &#8211; 
Petrobras</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Notes to the financial statements</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt"
face=Calibri,sans-serif>(Expressed in millions of US Dollars, unless otherwise 
indicated)</FONT></I></FONT></P>
<DIV style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 1pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; MARGIN: 
0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in"><FONT><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 5pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>28.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt"
face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>Segment information</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The Extraordinary General 
Meeting held on April 28, 2016 approved adjustments to the Company&#8217;s 
organization structure and governance and management model, aiming to align the 
organization with the new conditions faced by the oil and gas industry and to 
prioritize profitability and capital discipline. The new model does not propose 
discontinuing operations, however, it does consider merge of 
operations.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The current business segment 
information is reported in a manner in which the Company&#8217;s senior 
management assesses business performances, as well as makes decisions regarding 
investments and resources allocation. Due to adjustments in the organization 
structure and governance and management model, the Company may reassess its 
business segment report in order to improve management business 
analysis.</FONT></P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 100%" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 
border=0>

width="10%">

<TD style="HEIGHT: 15.75pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="9%">
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>

LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="9%">

style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-

medium none; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=red

none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium
none" color=#548dd4 face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>29.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt"
face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 
</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>Provisions for legal proceedings </FONT></B></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>29.1.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7pt" face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Provisions for legal 
proceedings, judicial deposits and contingent liabilities</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The Company recognizes
provisions based on the best estimate of the costs of proceedings for which it 
is probable that an outflow of resources embodying economic benefits will be 
required and that can be reliably estimated. These proceedings mainly 
include:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt 14.2pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
-14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Labor claims, in particular: (i) a review of the 
methodology by which the minimum compensation based on an employee's position 
and work schedule (Remunera&#231;&#227;o M&#237;nima por N&#237;vel e Regime - 
RMNR) is calculated; (ii) lawsuits relating to overtime pay; (iii) individual 
actions of outsourced employees;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt 14.2pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
-14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Tax claims including claims relating to Brazilian 
federal and state tax credits applied that were disallowed&nbsp; and demands 
relating to the VAT (ICMS) tax collection on jet fuel sales; </FONT></P>
<a name="_bclFooter41"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face="Times New Roman"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>

<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. &#8211; 
Petrobras</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Notes to the financial statements</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt"
face=Calibri,sans-serif>(Expressed in millions of US Dollars, unless otherwise 
indicated)</FONT></I></FONT></P>
<DIV style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 1pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in;

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:

lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Civil claims relating to losses and damages 
proceedings resulting from the cancellation of an assignment of excise tax (IPI)
credits to a third party, royalties collection over the shale extraction and 
alleged noncompliance with contractual terms relating to oil rig construction; 
and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt 14.2pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
-14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT

11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Environmental claims regarding fishermen seeking 
indemnification from the Company for a January 2000 oil spill in the State of 
Rio de Janeiro.</FONT></P>

7pt" face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Contingent 
liabilities</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Contingent liabilities for which
either the Company is unable to make a reliable estimate of the expected 
financial effect that might result from resolution of the proceeding, or a cash 
outflow is not probable, are not recognized as liabilities in the financial 
statements but are disclosed in the notes to the financial statements, unless 
the likelihood of any outflow of resources embodying economic benefits is 
considered remote.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The estimated contingent 
liabilities for legal proceedings as of June 30, 2016, for which the possibility
of loss is not considered remote are set out in the following table:</FONT></P>

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=right><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">543</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 12.75pt; PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE: avoid">
<TD style="HEIGHT: 12.75pt; BACKGROUND: white; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt 
solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 
3pt" vAlign=top width="87%">
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Plaintiff: State of Pernambuco 
Finance Department</FONT></B></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 12.75pt; BACKGROUND: white; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt 
solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 
3pt" vAlign=bottom width="13%">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=right><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 56.25pt; PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE: avoid">
<TD style="HEIGHT: 56.25pt; BACKGROUND: white; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-
TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=top width="87%">
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">17) Alleged incorrect application 
of VAT (ICMS) tax base with respect to interstate sales of natural gas transport
through city-gates in the State of Pernambuco destined to the distributors in 
that State. The Finance Department of the State of Pernambuco understands that 
activity as being an industrial activity which could not be characterized as an 
interstate sale transaction (considering that the Company has facilities located
in Pernambuco), and consequently charging the difference on the tax levied on 
the sale and transfer transactions.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 56.25pt; BACKGROUND: white; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-
TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="13%">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=right><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 13.5pt; PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE: avoid">
<TD style="HEIGHT: 13.5pt; BACKGROUND: white; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt 
solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 
3pt" vAlign=top width="87%">
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Current status: This claim involves
lawsuits in different administrative and judicial stages.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 13.5pt; BACKGROUND: white; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt

<TR style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt">

<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt"

<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt; BACKGROUND: white; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-

<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt"

<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Current status: The Company filed 
its collective bargaining agreement with the Superior Labor Court and, on 
October 19, 2015, the Court ruled in favor of the Company and notified the 
Regional Labor Courts of its understanding of the matter.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 33.75pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM:

<TR style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt">
<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt; BACKGROUND: white; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt

<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt; BACKGROUND: white; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt

<TR style="HEIGHT: 34.5pt">

<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">2) Class Actions regarding wage 
underpayments to certain employees due to alleged changes in the methodology 
used to factor overtime into the calculation of paid weekly rest, allegedly 
computed based on ratios that are higher than those established by Law No. 
605/49.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 34.5pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="13%">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=right><FONT lang=EN-

serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 48.75pt">
<TD style="HEIGHT: 48.75pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM:
0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" width="87%">
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Current status: The Superior Labor 
Court ("Tribunal Superior do Trabalho - TST") unified a favorable understanding 
to the Company's opinion. There are TST decisions favorable to the plaintiffs on
individual and collective proceedings judged before the mentioned unification. 
The Company has filed an appeal in the TST to overturn a decision with respect 
to the claim filed by Sindipetro Norte Fluminense (NF) and awaits 
judgment.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 48.75pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM:
0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom 
width="13%">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=right><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">1,482</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt">
<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt; BACKGROUND: white; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt 
solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 
3pt" vAlign=top width="87%">
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Plaintiff : Sindipetro of Norte Fluminense 
&#8211; SINDIPETRO/NF</FONT></B></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt; BACKGROUND: white; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt 
solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 
3pt" vAlign=top width="13%">
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 33pt">
<TD style="HEIGHT: 33pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT:
3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" width="87%">
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">3) The plaintiff claims Petrobras 
failed to pay overtime for standby work exceeding 12-hours per day. It also 
demands that the Company respects a 12-hour limit per workday, subject to a 
daily fine.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 33pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT:
3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="13%">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=right><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 24.75pt">
<TD style="HEIGHT: 24.75pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM:
0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" width="87%">
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Current status: Awaiting the 
Superior Labor Court to judge appeals filed by both parties.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 24.75pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM:
0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom 
width="13%">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=right><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">358</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt">
<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM:
0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=top 
width="87%">
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">4) Other labor matters</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM:

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=right><FONT

<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" color=red 
face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none"><B><FONT lang=EN-US

<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; WIDTH: 100%;

cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 12pt">
<TD style="HEIGHT: 12pt; BACKGROUND: white; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP:
0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=top width="87%">
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Description of civil 
matters</FONT></B></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 12pt; BACKGROUND: white; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt solid;
PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" 
width="13%">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=right><B><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face=calibri,sans-serif>Estimate</FONT></B></P></TD></TR>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt">
<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt; BACKGROUND: white; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt

3pt" vAlign=top width="87%">
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Plaintiff: Ag&#234;ncia Nacional de 
Petr&#243;leo, G&#225;s Natural e Biocombust&#237;veis - ANP</FONT></B></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt; BACKGROUND: white; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-
TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="13%">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=right><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 49.5pt">
<TD style="HEIGHT: 49.5pt; BACKGROUND: white; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-
TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" width="87%">
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">1) Proceedings challenging an ANP 
order requiring Petrobras to unite Lula and Cernambi fields on the BM-S-11 joint
venture; to unite Ba&#250;na and Piracicaba fields; to unite Tartaruga Verde and
Mesti&#231;a fields; and to unite Baleia An&#227;, Baleia Azul, Baleia Franca, 
Cachalote, Caxar&#233;u, Jubarte and Pirambu, in the Parque das Baleias complex,
which would cause changes in the payment of special participation 
charges.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 49.5pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="13%">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=right><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 100.5pt">
<TD style="HEIGHT: 100.5pt; BACKGROUND: white; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1px 
solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 
3pt" width="87%">
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Current status: The claims are 
being disputed in court and in arbitration proceedings. As a result of judicial 
decisions, the arbitrations have been suspended. On the Lula and Cernanbi 
proceeding, for the alleged differences on the special participation, the 
Company made judicial deposits. However, with the cancellation of the favorable 
injunction, currently the payment of these alleged differences have been made 
directly to ANP, until a final judicial decision is handed down. On the 
Ba&#250;na and Piracicaba proceeding, Petrobras made court-ordered judicial 
deposits. On the Baleia An&#227;, Baleia Azul, Baleia Franca, Cachalote, 
Caxar&#233;u, Jubarte and Pirambu, in the Parque das Baleias complex proceeding,
as a result of a judicial decision and of a Chamber of Arbitration ruling, the 
collection of the alleged differences has been suspended. On the Tartaruga Verde
and Mesti&#231;a proceeding, the arbitration is suspended by judicial decision 
and, so far, there has been no additional collection of special participation 
due to the unification.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 100.5pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM:
0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom 
width="13%">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=right><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">1,758</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 35.25pt">
<TD style="HEIGHT: 35.25pt; BACKGROUND: white; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-
TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" width="87%">
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">2) Administrative proceedings 
challenging an ANP order requiring Petrobras to pay special participation fees 
and royalties (government take) with respect to several fields and alleged 
failure to comply with the minimum exploration activities program, as well as 
alleged irregularities related to compliance with the oil and gas industry 
regulation.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 35.25pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="13%">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=right><FONT lang=EN-

<TR style="HEIGHT: 13.5pt">

3pt" width="87%">
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Current status: This claim involves
lawsuits in different administrative and judicial stages.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 13.5pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 
0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom 
width="13%">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=right><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-

<TR style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt">
<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt; BACKGROUND: white; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt

3pt" vAlign=top width="87%">
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Plaintiff: Several plaintiffs in 
Brazil and EIG Management Company in USA</FONT></B></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.25pt; BACKGROUND: white; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt

<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">3) Arbitration in Brazil and 
lawsuit in the USA regarding Sete Brasil.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 12.75pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=right><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-

<TR style="HEIGHT: 45.7pt">
<TD style="HEIGHT: 45.7pt; BACKGROUND: white; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt

3pt" width="87%">
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Current status: The arbitrations in
Brazil are at an early stage and a Chamber of Arbitration has not yet been 
established. On the lawsuit filed by EIG and affiliates, alleging that the 
Company had committed fraud by inducing plaintiffs to invest in Sete Brasil 
Participa&#231;&#245;es SA ("Sete"), through communications that failed to 
disclose the alleged corruption scheme. The period allowed to the Company to 
present its initial position before the federal court in Washington, DC is 
ongoing.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 45.7pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM:

<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black

<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt"

<TD style="BORDER-TOP: #008542 1pt solid; HEIGHT: 20.25pt; PADDING-BOTTOM:

3pt" width="87%">
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Current status: This claim is in 
the judicial stage and was ruled in favor of the plaintiff in the first stage. 
The Company is taking legal actions to ensure its rights. The Brazilian 
Antitrust regulator (CADE) has analyzed this claim and did not consider the 
Company's practices to be anti-competitive.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="HEIGHT: 36.75pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM:

<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt"

trials and the administrative appeal regarding the fines are pending, and others
are under judicial discussion. With respect to the civil action, the Company 
appealed the ruling that was unfavorable in the lower court and monitors the use
of the procedure that will be judged by the Regional Federal 
Court.</FONT></P></TD>

<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>
&nbsp; <A name="page_46"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%;">
<a name="_bclHeader46"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. &#8211; 
Petrobras</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Notes to the financial statements</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt"
face=Calibri,sans-serif>(Expressed in millions of US Dollars, unless otherwise 
indicated)</FONT></I></FONT></P>
<DIV style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 1pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; MARGIN: 
0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in"><FONT><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 5pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>29.4.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
7pt" face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Class action and related 
proceedings </FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Between December 8, 2014 and 
January 7, 2015, five putative securities class action complaints were filed 
against the Company in the United States District Court for the Southern 
District of New York (SDNY). These actions were consolidated on February 17, 
2015 (the &#8220;Consolidated Securities Class Action&#8221;). The Court 
appointed a lead plaintiff, Universities Superannuation Scheme Limited 
(&#8220;USS&#8221;), on March 4, 2015. USS filed a consolidated amended 
complaint (&#8220;CAC&#8221;) on March 27, 2015 that purported to be on behalf 
of investors who: </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt 14.2pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
-14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>a)</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>purchased or otherwise acquired Petrobras securities 
traded on the NYSE or pursuant to other transactions in the U.S. during the 
period January 22, 2010 and March 19, 2015, inclusive (the &#8220;Class 
Period&#8221;), and were damaged thereby;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt 14.2pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
-14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>b)</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>purchased or otherwise acquired during the Class Period 
certain notes issued in 2012 pursuant to a registration statement filed with the
SEC filed in 2009 , or certain notes issued in 2013&nbsp; or 2014 pursuant to a 
registration statement filed with the SEC in 2012 , and were damaged thereby; 
and </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt 14.2pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
-14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>c)</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>purchased or otherwise acquired Petrobras securities on 
the Brazilian stock exchange during the Class Period, who also purchased or 
otherwise acquired Petrobras securities traded on the NYSE or pursuant to other 
transactions in the U.S. during the same period.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The CAC alleged, among other 
things, that in the Company&#8217;s press releases, filings with the SEC and 
other communications, the Company made materially false and misleading
statements and omissions regarding the value of its assets, the amounts of the 
Company&#8217;s expenses and net income, the effectiveness of the 
Company&#8217;s internal controls over financial reporting, and the 
Company&#8217;s anti-corruption policies, due to alleged corruption purportedly 
in connection with certain contracts, which allegedly artificially inflated the 
market value of the Company&#8217;s securities.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>On April 17, 2015, Petrobras, 
Petrobras Global Finance - PGF and the underwriters of notes issued by PGF (the 
&#8220;Underwriter Defendants&#8221;) filed a motion to dismiss the 
CAC.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>On July 9, 2015, the judge 
presiding over the Consolidated Securities Class Action ruled on the motion to 
dismiss, partially granting the Company&#8217;s motion. Among other decisions, 
the judge dismissed claims relating to certain debt securities issued in 2012 
under the Securities Act of 1933, as time barred by the Securities Act&#8217;s 
statute of repose and ruled claims relating to securities purchased on the 
Brazilian stock exchange must be arbitrated, as established in the 
Company&#8217;s bylaws. The judge rejected other arguments presented in the 
motion to dismiss the CAC and, as a result, the Consolidated Securities Class 
Action continued with respect to other claims.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>As allowed by the judge, a 
second consolidated amended complaint was filed on July 16, 2015, a third 
consolidated amended complaint was filed on September 1, 2015, among other 
things extending the Class Period through July 28, 2015 and adding Petrobras 
America, Inc. as a defendant, and a fourth consolidated amended complaint 
(&#8220;FAC&#8221;) was filed on November 30, 2015. The FAC, brought by lead 
plaintiff and three other plaintiffs &#8211; Union Asset Management Holding AG 
(&#8220;Union&#8221;), Employees&#8217; Retirement System of the State of Hawaii
(&#8220;Hawaii&#8221;), and North Carolina Department of State Treasurer 
(&#8220;North Carolina&#8221;) (collectively, &#8220;class plaintiffs&#8221;) 
&#8211; brings those claims alleged in the CAC that were not dismissed or were 
allowed to be re-pleaded under the judge&#8217;s July 9, 2015 ruling.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>On October 1<SUP>st</SUP> and 
December 7, 2015, Petrobras, PGF, Petrobras America, Inc. and the Underwriter 
Defendants filed a motion to dismiss the FAC.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>On December 20, 2015, the judge 
ruled on the motion to dismiss the FAC, partially granting the motion. Among 
other decisions, the judge dismissed the claims of USS and Union based on their 
purchases of notes issued by PGF </FONT>
<FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></P>
<a name="_bclFooter46"></a><DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=center><FONT 
style="DISPLAY: none" face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE:
11pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT 
lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif>46</FONT></FONT><FONT
face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT style="DISPLAY: none"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT><FONT 
face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></P></DIV></DIV>
<HR align=center SIZE=2 width="100%" noShade>
<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>
&nbsp; <A name="page_47"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader47"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. &#8211; 
Petrobras</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Notes to the financial statements</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt"
face=Calibri,sans-serif>(Expressed in millions of US Dollars, unless otherwise 
indicated)</FONT></I></FONT></P>
<DIV style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 1pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; MARGIN: 
0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in"><FONT><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 5pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>for failure to plead that they 
purchased the notes in U.S. transactions. The judge also dismissed claims under 
the Securities Act of 1933 for certain purchases for which class plaintiffs had 
failed to plead the element of reliance. The judge rejected other arguments 
presented in the motion to dismiss the FAC and, as a result, the Consolidated 
Securities Class Action will continue with respect to the remaining 
claims.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>On October 15, 2015, class 
plaintiffs filed a motion for class certification in the Consolidated Securities
Class Action, and on November 6, 2015, Petrobras, PGF, Petrobras America, Inc. 
and the Underwriter Defendants opposed the motion. On February 2, 2016, the 
judge granted plaintiffs&#8217; motion for class certification, certifying a 
Securities Act Class represented by Hawaii and North Carolina and an Exchange 
Act Class represented by USS. On June 15, 2016, the United States Court of 
Appeals for the Second Circuit granted Petrobras&#8217; motion requesting 
interlocutory appellate review of the class certification. Defendants filed 
their opening briefs on July 21, 2016.&nbsp; Plaintiffs opposition brief is due 
on August 25, 2016, and replies are due on September 8, 2016.&nbsp; Oral 
argument is scheduled to occur no sooner than September 26, 2016. Petrobras and 
the other defendants moved in district court for a stay of all district court 
proceedings pending the Second Circuit&#8217;s decision on the merits of the 
appeal of the class certification.&nbsp; On June 24, 2016, the judge denied the 
motion. On June 28, 2016, Petrobras and other defendants moved the Second 
Circuit for a stay of the district court proceedings pending that Court&#8217;s 
decision on the merits of the appeal. On August 2, 2016, the United States Court
of Appeals for the Second Circuit granted Defendants&#8217; motion to stay all 
district court proceedings pending a decision on the appeal of the class 
certification.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>On June 27, 2016, the parties 
filed motions for summary judgment.&nbsp; Further summary judgment briefing is 
stayed pursuant to the Second Circuit&#8217;s Order.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>In addition to the Consolidated 
Securities Class Action, to date, 29 lawsuits have been filed by individual 
investors before the same judge in the SDNY (two of which have been stayed), and
one has been filed in the United States District Court for the Eastern District 
of Pennsylvania, consisting of allegations similar to those in the Consolidated 
Securities Class Action. On August 21, 2015, Petrobras, PGF and underwriters of 
notes issued by PGF filed a motion to dismiss certain of the individual 
lawsuits, and on October 15, 2015, the judge ruled on the motion to dismiss, 
partially granting the motion. Among other decisions, the judge dismissed 
several Exchange Act, Securities Act and state law claims as barred by the 
relevant statutes of repose. The judge denied other portions of the motion to 
dismiss and, as a result, these actions will continue with respect to other 
claims brought by these class plaintiffs.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>On October 31, 2015, the judge 
ordered that the individual lawsuits before him in the SDNY and the Consolidated
Securities Class Action shall be tried together in a single trial that will not 
exceed a total of eight weeks.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>On November 5, 2015, the judge 
scheduled the trial to begin on September 19, 2016, however, the trial is now 
stayed due to the above-mentioned Second Circuit decision of August 2, 2016, 
staying all district court proceedings. On November 18, 2015, the judge ordered 
that any individual action filed after December 31, 2015 will be stayed in all 
respects until after the completion of the trial.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>These actions involve highly 
complex issues that are subject to substantial uncertainties and depend on a 
number of factors such as the novelty of the legal theories, the information 
produced in discovery, the timing of court decisions, discovery from adverse 
parties or third parties, rulings by the court on key issues, analysis by 
retained experts, and the possibility that the parties negotiate in good faith 
toward a resolution.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>In addition, the claims asserted
are broad, span a multi-year period and involve a wide range of activities, and 
the contentions of the plaintiffs in the Consolidated Securities Class Action 
and the individual additional actions concerning the amount of alleged damages 
are varied and, at this stage, their impact on the course of the litigation is 
complex and uncertain. The uncertainties inherent in all such matters affect the
amount and timing of </FONT>
<FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>the ultimate 
resolution of these actions. As a result, the Company is unable to make a 
reliable estimate of eventual loss arising from the litigation.</FONT></P>
<a name="_bclFooter47"></a><DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=center><FONT
style="DISPLAY: none" face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE:
11pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT 
lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif>47</FONT></FONT><FONT
face=calibri,sans-serif><FONT style="DISPLAY: none"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT><FONT 
face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT><FONT face=calibri,sans-

&nbsp; <A name="page_48"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%;">
<a name="_bclHeader48"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Petr&#243;leo Brasileiro S.A. &#8211; 
Petrobras</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Notes to the financial statements</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt"
face=Calibri,sans-serif>(Expressed in millions of US Dollars, unless otherwise 
indicated)</FONT></I></FONT></P>
<DIV style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 1pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; 
BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in">
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 0in; MARGIN: 
0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in"><FONT><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 5pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>Depending on the outcome of the 
litigation, we may be required to pay substantial amounts, which could have a 
material adverse effect on the Company&#8217;s financial condition, its 
consolidated results of operations or its consolidated cash flows for an 
individual reporting period. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The Company has engaged a U.S. 
firm as legal counsel and intends to defend these actions vigorously.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>30.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt"
face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 
</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>Collateral for crude oil exploration concession agreements </FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The Company has granted
collateral to the Brazilian Agency of Petroleum, Natural Gas and Biofuels 
(</FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif>Ag&#234;ncia Nacional de Petr&#243;leo, G&#225;s Natural e 
Biocombust&#237;veis -ANP</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>) in connection with the performance of the Minimum 
Exploration Programs established in the concession agreements for petroleum 
exploration areas in the total amount of US$ 2,373 of which US$ 1,022 were still
in force as of June 30, 2016, net of commitments undertaken. The collateral 
comprises crude oil from previously identified producing fields, pledged as 
collateral, amounting to US$ 848 and bank guarantees of US$ 174.</FONT></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 12pt 
28.35pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>31.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt"
face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></B><B><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>&nbsp;Risk 
management</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>The Company is exposed to a 
variety of risks arising from its operations, including price risk (related to 
crude oil and oil products prices), foreign exchange rates risk, interest rates 
risk, credit risk and liquidity risk. Corporate risk management is part of the 
Company&#8217;s commitment to act ethically and comply with the legal and 
regulatory requirements of the countries where it operates. To manage market and
financial risks the Company preferably takes structuring measures through an 
adequate capital and leverage management. The Company takes account of risks in 
its business decisions and manages any such risk in an integrated manner in 
order to enjoy the benefits of diversification.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 12pt"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif>A summary of the derivative 
financial instruments positions held by the Company and recognized in other 
current assets and liabilities as of June 30, 2016, as well as the amounts 
recognized in the statement of income and other comprehensive income and the 
guarantees given is set out as follows:</FONT></P>

<TD style="HEIGHT: 11.45pt; BORDER-BOTTOM: #008542 1pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM:
